alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 12:21AM CDT until August 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Shannon County in south central Missouri... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bunker to 12 miles north of Eminence to 11 miles east of Raymondville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Echo Bluff State Park, Current River State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Winona, Birch Tree, Eminence, Alley Spring, Midridge, Round Spring, West Eminence and Akers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
